context: Hello how are you, can you recommend a movie?
The Conjuring (2013) well I like it a lot
I did not see it but I saw the trailer and it seemed very good, do you recommend another bro?
or I can also recommend this Saw (2003)
that movie is also good, recommend me another bro?
resp: if you want to see another one it can also be It (1990)
